TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NameValueCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 代表相關聯之 索引鍵和 值的集合，可使用索引鍵或索引來存取。

span.span: Represents a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合根據類別。This collection is based on the class. 不過，不同於，這個類別會儲存在單一的機碼下的多個字串值。However, unlike the , this class stores multiple string values under a single key. 這個類別可以用於標頭、 查詢字串和表單資料。This class can be used for headers, query strings and form data. 每個項目是索引鍵/值組。Each element is a key/value pair. 這個型別的集合不會保留排序的項目，並沒有特定的順序保證會列舉集合時。Collections of this type do not preserve the ordering of element, and no particular ordering is guaranteed when enumerating the collection. 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊程式碼提供者。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子是。The default comparer is the . 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，這個類別會使用區分文化特性字串比較。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 不過，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更新版本中，這個類別會使用比較字串時。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 如需文化特性如何影響比較和排序的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行不區分文化特性的字串作業](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). `null` 可做為索引鍵或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > 方法不會區分`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`因為索引鍵相關聯的值是傳回哪個`null`。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CPP/nvc.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CS/nvc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/VB/nvc.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但是在衍生的類別可以建立他們自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性類別。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property of the class.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白的、具有預設的初始容量，並使用預設不區分大小寫的雜湊碼提供者和預設不區分大小寫的比較子。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity and uses the default case-insensitive hash code provider and the default case-insensitive comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊程式碼提供者。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子是。The default comparer is the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer equalityComparer) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: equalityComparer
param.span: 物件，可用來判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等，以及為集合中的索引鍵產生雜湊碼。

span.span: The object to use to determine whether two keys are equal and to generate hash codes for the keys in the collection.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白的、具有預設的初始容量，並使用指定的 物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity, and uses the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運物件是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 物件結合的比較子和雜湊程式碼提供者。The object combines the comparer and the hash code provider. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 從指定的 複製項目至新的 ，使其具有與複製的項目數相同的初始容量，並使用與來源集合相同的雜湊碼提供者和相同的比較子。

span.span: Copies the entries from the specified to a new with the same initial capacity as the number of entries copied and using the same hash code provider and the same comparer as the source collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊程式碼提供者。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子是。The default comparer is the . 新的項目做為來源相同的順序排序。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order as the source . 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`col`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊程式碼提供者。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子是。The default comparer is the . 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`. 如果中的項目數`col`大於`capacity`，這個建構函式會變成 O (`n` + `m`) 作業，其中`n`是`capacity`和`m`數目中的項目`col`。If the number of elements in `col` is greater than `capacity`, this constructor becomes an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is `capacity` and `m` is the number of elements in `col`.

span.span: Copies the entries in the specified to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的索引鍵`c`已經存在於目標執行個體相關聯的值，在`c`新增至現有以逗號分隔清單在目標中相同的索引鍵相關聯的值執行個體。If a key in `c` already exists in the target instance, the associated value in `c` is added to the existing comma-separated list of values associated with the same key in the target instance. 如果已等於容量的容量會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比容量，這個方法是 o （1） 作業。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.
is .

span.span: Adds an entry with the specified name and value to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵已經存在於目標執行個體，指定的值會加入至現有以逗號分隔的清單表單中的值`"value1,value2,value3"`。If the specified key already exists in the target instance, the specified value is added to the existing comma-separated list of values in the form `"value1,value2,value3"`. 值是在目標中相同的索引鍵相關聯執行個體。The values are associated with the same key in the target instance. 如果已等於容量的容量會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比容量，這個方法是 o （1） 作業。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合是空的這個方法會傳回空白陣列，不`null`。If the collection is empty, this method returns an empty array, not `null`. 傳回的陣列快取以提升效能，當集合變更時，會自動重新整理。The arrays returned by are cached for better performance and are automatically refreshed when the collection changes. 在衍生的類別可以讓快取的版本失效藉由呼叫，藉此強制重新建立陣列。A derived class can invalidate the cached version by calling , thereby forcing the arrays to be recreated. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 無法設定這個屬性。This property cannot be set. 若要設定的值，指定索引處，使用`Item[GetKey(index)]`。To set the value at a specified index, use `Item[GetKey(index)]`. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取指定之索引處的值是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是值的數目。Retrieving the values at the specified index is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[name]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[name]`. 如果指定的索引鍵已經存在集合中，設定這個屬性會覆寫現有的值具有指定的值。If the specified key already exists in the collection, setting this property overwrites the existing list of values with the specified value. 若要將新值附加至現有的值清單中，使用方法。To append the new value to the existing list of values, use the method. 如果指定的索引鍵不存在於集合中，設定這個屬性會建立新的項目，使用指定的索引鍵和指定的值。If the specified key does not exist in the collection, setting this property creates a new entry using the specified key and the specified value. > [!CAUTION] > 這個屬性會傳回`null`在下列情況： 1) 如果找不到指定的索引鍵;和 2） 如果找到指定的索引鍵，且其相關聯的值為`null`。This property returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 這個屬性不會區分兩種情況。This property does not distinguish between the two cases. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取或設定指定的索引鍵相關聯的值是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是值的數目。Retrieving or setting the values associated with the specified key is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵的項目會維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The collection is read-only.
